quoteText:
We may de-identify and aggregate information collected through the Site for statistical analysis and other lawful purpose, including in research studies intended to improve our understanding of how people learn with Scratch.
The results of this research are shared with educators and researchers through conferences, journals, and other publications.
You can find out more on our Research page.
title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

tosdr.case: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
